text: Marty Riessen and Margaret Court were the defending champions and successfully defended their title, defeating Frew McMillan and Judy Dalton 6–4, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom Half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== ==External links== *1970 US Open – Doubles draws and results at the International Tennis Federation Mixed Doubles Category:US Open (tennis) by year – Mixed Doubles
